channel.title: 4chan vs. tumblr
channel.description:
So i heard that 4chan is starting war with trumblr? Ha! No offence, but that is so funny to me. I heard that they were spammin pics of kittens and all that because 4chan started to hack tumblr. Give me your thoughts on it.
If you don't know they waged war then read this : [url=http://gawker.com/5689652/4chan-vs-tumblr-whoever-wins-we-all-lose]http://gawker.com/5689652/4chan-vs-tumblr-whoever-wins-we-all-lose[/url]

item.title: 4chan vs. tumblr
item.dc:creator: @Javafire Javafire
item.description:
@Javafire wrote:

Phaze One:

Tumblr started this all. 4chan is full of narcissistic prats with too much time on their hands. Tumblr will fall never to rise again.

4chan affiliation? jk

yeaahhh well most likely tumblr is setting up backups ect… for safety.

Read full topic

item.title: 4chan vs. tumblr
item.dc:creator: @zoltanman zoltanman
item.description:
@zoltanman wrote:

[quote=“Taharok, post:13, topic:368972”][quote author=zoltanman link=topic=465102.msg3401411#msg3401411 date=1289953101]
“There’s a lot of overlap between 4chan and Tumblr, as each is comprised largely of teenagers who spend far too much time on the computer.”

INTERNET WARRIORS, UNITE!
[/quote]

Ugh, haha. Pretty sure the vast majority of 4chan users are adults. ;)[/quote]

Teenager mentality, of course.

Read full topic
